document.heading: Fiscal Year 2009 Budget Support Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-219, the “Fiscal Year 2009 Budget Support Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-678, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 13, 2008, and June 3, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 26, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-419 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-219 became effective on August 16, 2008.
